tool.name: Partition genes into expression clusters
tool.description: after differential expression analysis using a Trinity assembly
tool.command:
define_clusters_by_cutting_tree.pl
-R '${rdata}'
#if str( $method.method_selector ) == "--Ptree": --Ptree ${method.ptree} #else #if str( $method.method_selector ) == "--Ktree": --Ktree ${method.ktree} #else -K ${method.k} #end if #end if
$additional_params.column_ordering
&& mv *.clusters_fixed_*/* .

param.name: rdata
param.label: RData file
param.help: RData file produced by 'Extract and cluster differentially expressed transcripts from a Trinity assembly' tool

param.name: method_selector
param.label: Method for partitioning genes into clusters
param.option: Cut tree based on x percent of max(height) of tree
Define K clusters via k-means algorithm

param.name: ptree
param.label: Cut tree based on this percent of max(height) of tree

param.name: k
param.label: Define K clusters via k-means algorithm
param.help: This does not leverage the already hierarchically clustered genes, and instead uses a least-sum-of-squares method to define exactly k gene clusters.

param.name: column_ordering
param.label: Column ordering in expression matrices
param.option: No reordering based on sample clustering
Reorder column names according to lexical ordering

collection.name: expression_matrices
collection.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: expression matrices for each cluster

tool.help:
Trinity_ assembles transcript sequences from Illumina RNA-Seq data. This tool partitions the differentially expressed genes into gene clusters with similar expression patterns by one of several available methods, once differential expression analyses have been runned. It is a companion tool for the tool 'Extract and cluster differentially expressed transcripts from a Trinity assembly'.
**Inputs**
This tool uses the RData file produced by 'Extract and cluster differentially expressed transcripts from a Trinity assembly' tool.
.. _Trinity: http://trinityrnaseq.github.io
